title: Queen of Flies - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Harem   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Bullying   Child Abuse   Death of Loved Ones   Female Protagonist   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Reverse Harem   Yandere
author: Kokutou Mami   黒塔真実
description:
Growing up in a garbage room in a cheap apartment, I tragically died and no living in the world of my favorite anime, “Burnt Hair Melody”
However, I was reborn as Alice Lenier, a lady of nobility, whose true character was that of the villainous boss, the ‘Queen’
Once again, it was a life full of unhappiness since childhood.
I, Alice successfully got promoted in the Evil Organization with a longing desire to attend a night party at the royal palace. Which was the first episode of the animation.
At the age of 16, I was taken by a good-looking guardian… of course, I’m trying to be invisible as much as possible as the supporting character.
However, for some reason, it’s, I, Alice, not the heroine that was invited by the crown prince, male lead, for his first dance
…!?
This is completely the opposite, but for sure it’ll go back to track later on.>
